Various improvements and performance enhancements.
Various improvements and performance enhancements.

- New and improved mortgage calculator tools.
- Various improvements and performance enhancements.

- New and improved mortgage calculator tools.
- Various improvements and performance enhancements.

- We've removed a bug that a small group of users had encountered since the last app update.
- Improvements have been made to the iPad version.

- We've removed a bug that a small group of users had encountered since the last app update.
- Improvements have been made to the iPad version.
The app is now compatible with iOS 9, and we've made some performance enhancements that all users should benefit from.
The app is now compatible with iOS 9, and we've made some performance enhancements that all users should benefit from.

- Draw your own search with your finger on our new interactive maps.
- It’s even easier to save your favourite properties and share them with friends
- Your last search is now saved, allowing you to carry on your search from where you left it 
- You can now swipe left and right on property details pages to see the next on the list

- Draw your own search with your finger on our new interactive maps.
- It’s even easier to save your favourite properties and share them with friends
- Your last search is now saved, allowing you to carry on your search from where you left it 
- You can now swipe left and right on property details pages to see the next on the list

- The sign in feature now works if you have special characters in your email address
- You can now email multiple agents on results pages
- We've fixed a couple of small bugs
- For the next release, you will be able to follow house price changes in your favourites, and we'll be adding all of our overseas properties to the app. Watch this space!

- The sign in feature now works if you have special characters in your email address
- You can now email multiple agents on results pages
- We've fixed a couple of small bugs
- For the next release, you will be able to follow house price changes in your favourites, and we'll be adding all of our overseas properties to the app. Watch this space!
Bug fixes and performance improvements for older versions of iOS
Bug fixes and performance improvements for older versions of iOS
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- You can now add properties to the favourites section and track their value over time.
- You can also see when a property gets sold or is under offer in your favourites.
- We've made MyZoopla easier to use. Your alerts, favourites and homes you have claimed all sit in the MyZoopla section in the side menu.

- You can now add properties to the favourites section and track their value over time.
- You can also see when a property gets sold or is under offer in your favourites.
- We've made MyZoopla easier to use. Your alerts, favourites and homes you have claimed all sit in the MyZoopla section in the side menu.

With this update: find new features, improvements in design and bug fixes.

New Features:

- New! Search house prices and better see how they change over time with our new improved design.
- New! You can now search for properties overseas and find your dream holiday home.
- New! Use commercial search to find offices, retail, hospitality or industrial spaces.

Improvements: 
 
- Faster loading of property images.
- New and improved menu.
- Refine search filters for better property search.
- Sort popular properties by reduced prices.

With this update: find new features, improvements in design and bug fixes.

New Features:

- New! Search house prices and better see how they change over time with our new improved design.
- New! You can now search for properties overseas and find your dream holiday home.
- New! Use commercial search to find offices, retail, hospitality or industrial spaces.

Improvements: 
 
- Faster loading of property images.
- New and improved menu.
- Refine search filters for better property search.
- Sort popular properties by reduced prices.
Bug fixes and performance optimisations
Bug fixes and performance optimisations

With this update: Added new feature and minor bug fixes.
 
-New! Almost every property, for sale or for rent, will now feature Zoopla's new Running Costs tool. The tool offers an at-a-glance indication of what a home’s monthly costs might be and includes energy, council tax, water bills and mortgage repayments if you’re buying or monthly rent if you’re renting.

-Improved sorting order of house price results to make property search easier. You can now sort results by Address, Last sold, Price paid and Estimated Value.

-Various bug fixes including syncing favourite properties issue which affected some users is fixed in this update.

With this update: Added new feature and minor bug fixes.
 
-New! Almost every property, for sale or for rent, will now feature Zoopla's new Running Costs tool. The tool offers an at-a-glance indication of what a home’s monthly costs might be and includes energy, council tax, water bills and mortgage repayments if you’re buying or monthly rent if you’re renting.

-Improved sorting order of house price results to make property search easier. You can now sort results by Address, Last sold, Price paid and Estimated Value.

-Various bug fixes including syncing favourite properties issue which affected some users is fixed in this update.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

With this update: Added new feature and minor bug fixes for iOS 10

-New! Featured properties are now visible. Property videos are also available.

-New! Find A Professional service is now available.

-House price section is updated. Now you can view property history with home value graphs.

-Various bug fixes including saving your history which will allow you to continue your journey where you left.

With this update: Added new feature and minor bug fixes for iOS 10

-New! Featured properties are now visible. Property videos are also available.

-New! Find A Professional service is now available.

-House price section is updated. Now you can view property history with home value graphs.

-Various bug fixes including saving your history which will allow you to continue your journey where you left.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- House price section now improved with property history
- Improved Overseas property search 
- (Optional) Property report to boost your research with over 50 more area facts
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Keep sending us your feedback, we're working hard to make this your favorite app.

- House price section now improved with property history
- Improved Overseas property search 
- (Optional) Property report to boost your research with over 50 more area facts
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- (New)  See the broadband speeds available for property listings
- Improved monthly running cost calculator

- Stability improvements

More great features coming soon! Whether you're selling, buying or renting right now, we love hearing your ongoing feedback.

- Stability improvements
- Improved access to privacy policy and legal documents

More great features coming soon! Whether you're selling, buying or renting right now, we love hearing your ongoing feedback.

- Push notifications introduced

- Improved stability

Where to start... Well, you might have noticed we've completely redesigned the navigation. The old 'hamburger' menu is out and we've found new homes for everything that was in it. It's clean, simple and should help you find the things you need faster.

On the home screen you'll instantly see new matches for your most recent searches and we also have a new 'properties' section where you can find potential homes you've checked out.

Sign in to reveal more features, such as saved searches, the homes you have saved for later, the agents you've contacted and viewing dates for your chosen properties.

Finally, we've freshened up the design. This means a stack of new illustrations, clearer language and more space for the really important stuff... such as those property photos we all love.

Where to start... Well, you might have noticed we've completely redesigned the navigation. The old 'hamburger' menu is out and we've found new homes for everything that was in it. It's clean, simple and should help you find the things you need faster.

On the home screen you'll instantly see new matches for your most recent searches and we also have a new 'properties' section where you can find potential homes you've checked out.

Sign in to reveal more features, such as saved searches, the homes you have saved for later, the agents you've contacted and viewing dates for your chosen properties.

Finally, we've freshened up the design. This means a stack of new illustrations, clearer language and more space for the really important stuff... such as those property photos we all love.
